metadata.title: CVE-2013-3109 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
SSL vaildation failed to validate hostnames

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-3109` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sieve-connect - 0.87-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sieve-connect package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.87-1').
